forum.content:
POI stands for Point of interest. It is the keyboard searched by every tourist. widely used rom city guides to cellphone digital maps.

For your reference we have the top 30 POIs in Taiwan from the site I've just googled.

Here's just an example how I would proudly present my neighborhood area.

"Danshui district has the most old buildings built by foreigners. Probably because of it's geographical importance. Deep river all the way to inner land. A natural harbor for large ships. Business men from different countries gathered here for trading since countries ago.

Besides it's charming history. Our local food called A Ge is also well known. And standing on the Lover's bridge for a billion dollar sunset view is something you don't wanna miss."
